src:
Leicester fortsetter √• imponere - p√• tredjeplass etter sterk seier
Leicesters vant i London.
03 Nov 2019, 16:19 by NTB

CRYSTAL PALACE - LEICESTER 0‚Äì2

Midtstopper Caglar Soyuncu stanget inn lederm√•let p√• en corner rett f√∏r timen var spilt p√• Selhurst Park i London. Like f√∏r slutt scoret Jamie Vardy etter et flott Leicester-angrep.

Med 2‚Äì0-seieren er Leicester oppe p√• 23 poeng. Dermed er laget foran Chelsea p√• m√•lforskjell. De bl√• fra London l√•nte tredjeplassen noen timer etter seier l√∏rdag kveld.

Leicester har √•pnet Premier League-sesongen forrykende og framst√•r som en seri√∏s kandidat til √• snike seg inn blant de fire beste som sikrer spill i mesterligaen. De er bare to poeng bak Manchester City p√• 2.-plass, mens det skiller √•tte poeng opp til serieleder Liverpool etter elleve serierunder.
‚Äì Det var en viktig seier. Vi har slitt p√• denne banen tidligere. Kreativiteten og de offensive kvalitetene vi har er fantastiske, sa Vardy til BBC etter kampen.
Med ti m√•l er han mestscorende i Premier League. Tammy Abraham og Sergio Ag√ºero f√∏lger like bak med ni scoringer hver.
‚Äì Jeg tar bare √©n kamp om gangen. Jeg f√•r servert mange sjanser fra lagkameratene mine, og for √∏yeblikket klarer jeg √• score p√• dem, sa spissen til Sky Sports.

King senket United ‚Äì etterp√• tok Solskj√¶r selvkritikk



Caglar Soyuncu (til h√∏yre) scoret det f√∏rste m√•let da Leicester vant 2-0 borte mot Crystal Palace s√∏ndag.üì∑ Foto: John Walton / AP / NTB scanpix

Dobbel etter pause
Leicester har bare to tap i ligaen (borte mot Manchester United og Liverpool) og kom til London s√∏ndag fulle av selvtillit etter den rekordstore seieren borte mot Southampton i forrige runde. S√∏ndag viste de nok en gang at de mener alvor.
F√∏rsteomgangen var uten det helt store spillet. Riktignok hadde begge lag sine muligheter. Blant annet var gjestene farlige p√• d√∏dballer.

Og det var p√• en fast situasjon som skulle gi Leicester ledelsen etter 57 minutter. James Maddison pisket inn en corner. Soyuncu l√∏p seg fri i feltet og headet ballen i nettet via bakken. Det var tyrkerens f√∏rste m√•l for Leicester.

To minutter f√∏r slutt var alt h√•p om poeng ute for Roy Hodgsons hjemmelag. Vardy og innbytter Demarai Gray kombinerte vakkert. Kantspilleren fant spissen inne i feltet, og som vanlig var Vardy klinisk.

Liverpool vant etter utrolig snuoperasjon: ‚Äì Den beste f√∏lelsen

Imponerende start
Fra tribunen sang h√∏ytsvevende Leicester-supportere om at de kommer til √• vinne ligaen. Klubben som vant ligaen i 2016 ser ut til √• ha noe stort p√• gang ogs√• denne sesongen.

I tillegg til √• ha en imponerende poengfangst, har Leicester sluppet inn f√¶rrest m√•l i Premier League.

N√• venter Arsenal hjemme i Leicester i neste serierunde. Deretter skal serietreeren ut i det som p√• papiret er fine kamper i ukene framover. Dermed ligger alt til rette for at Brendan Rodgers og co. skal v√¶re med h√∏yt p√• tabellen ogs√• n√•r det n√¶rmer seg jul.

Hodgsons Crystal Palace har ogs√• hatt en fin sesongstart, men s√∏ndag slet de med √• spille seg til de helt store sjansene. Klubben ligger likevel p√• niendeplass i ligaen.
text:
Leicester continue to impress - in third place after strong victory
Leicesters won in London.
03 Nov 2019, 16:19 by NTB

CRYSTAL PALACE - LEICESTER 0‚Äì2

Midstop Caglar Soyuncu pinned the leader on a corner just before the hour was played at Selhurst Park in London. Just before the finish, Jamie Vardy scored after a great Leicester attack.

With the 2-0 win, Leicester is up 23 points. Thus, the team is ahead of Chelsea on goal difference. The Blue's from London borrowed third place a few hours after victory Saturday night.

Leicester have opened the Premier League season astonishingly and appear to be a serious candidate to sneak in among the top four securing games in the Champions League. They are just two points behind Manchester City in second place, while it separates eight points up to Liverpool manager after eleven series rounds.
- It was an important victory. We have struggled on this track before. The creativity and offensive qualities we have are amazing, Vardy told the BBC after the match.
With ten goals, he is the top scorer in the Premier League. Tammy Abraham and Sergio Ag√ºero follow just behind with nine scores each.
- I only take one fight at a time. I get served a lot of chances from my teammates and at the moment I manage to score on them, the tip told Sky Sports.

King sunk United - afterwards, Solskj√¶r took self-criticism



Caglar Soyuncu (right) scored the first goal as Leicester won 2-0 away against Crystal Palace on Sunday.üì∑ Photo: John Walton / AP / NTB scanpix

Double after break
Leicester have just two losses in the league (away from Manchester United and Liverpool) and came to London on Sunday full of confidence after the record-breaking victory against Southampton in the previous round. On Sunday they once again showed that they were serious.
The first round was without the big game. Admittedly, both teams had their opportunities. Among other things, guests were dangerous on death balls.

It was an obvious ambition of Leicester to score after 57 minutes. James Maddison whipped a corner. Soyuncu ran free in the field and headed the ball into the net via the ground. It was the Turks' first goal for Leicester.

Two minutes before the end, all hope for points was out for Roy Hodgson's home team. Vardy and Demarai Gray replaces beautifully. The opponent found the tip inside the field, and as usual, Vardy was clinical.

Liverpool won after incredible turnaround: - The best feeling

Impressive start
From the stands, high-flying Leicester supporters sang that they would win the league. The club that won the league in 2016 seems to have something big going on this season as well.

In addition to having an impressive catch, Leicester have conceded few goals in the Premier League.

Now Arsenal are waiting at home in Leicester for the next series round. Then the comic strip will be out in what is on the paper nice matches in the weeks ahead. So everything is right for Brendan Rodgers and co. should be high on the table even as it approaches Christmas.

Hodgson's Crystal Palace has also had a nice start to the season, but on Sunday they struggled to play for the big chances. The club is still in ninth place in the league.
